committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 96-432 relating to the United States Capitol Grounds to authorize additional funds for the acquisition of certain property for addition to the United States Capitol Grounds.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for the acquisition of certain real property in the District of Columbia for addition to the U.S. Capitol Grounds.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 96-432 relating to the United States Capitol Grounds to authorize additional funds for the acquisition of certain property for addition to the United States Capitol Grounds.
